title: Salsa Verde
source: Bricia Lopez, Javier Cabral - Asada: The Art of Mexican-Style Grilling
categories: Asada: The Art of Mexican-Style Grilling
ingredients: 8½ounces (250 g) green tomatillos milperos, husked and washed
½large white onion (5¼ ounces/150 g), quartered
1cup (40 g) loosely packed fresh cilantro, leaves and tender stems only
directions: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the tomatillos, serranos, onion, garlic, oregano, cane sugar, and ¼ cup (60 ml) water. Stir and cook until the tomatillos have softened, about 10 minutes.
In a blender or food processor, blend the tomatillo mixture with the cilantro and ground coriander until smooth. Set aside.
In a medium saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the salsa and bring to a boil. Remove from the heat, season with the salt, and allow to cool before serving.
